bio: A floating helmet that was worn by a famous military commander. He spends his days searching for his body—a good use of time.

soultimate.name: Helmsman Helm
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases own Defense by 350% for 30 seconds
soultimate.description: Defense greatly increased, and foes focus on you.

skill.effect: Soul Meter increases when guarding foe’s attack.
skill.name: Guardian Spirit

name: Helmsman
